photoAlt: Clayton Hunt JavaScript developer Louisville, KY October 21, 2015
title: Making 'this' Go Away
description: Would you like to never again be bothered by 'this'? Learn the pitfalls of JavaScript's 'this' keyword and the ways to avoid the problem. Then, master 'this' by bending it to your will with the dark arts of call, apply, and bind.

title: JSLou JavaScript Hack Night
description: Come hang out, chat, and work on anything JavaScript related!
